title: This Year’s Goals
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Shizuku-chan, do you have any goals for the new year?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes. I’d like to convey a world I’d like to express to as many people as I can through my singing and dancing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I see. That’s a perfect goal for you, Shizuku-chan. As for me, I want to keep making amazing stage outfits so make all of us in Aqours even more amazing ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Wow, that’s an incredible goal, You-san! Hearing it makes me very excited!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Excited?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>After all, it means that I’ll get to see your amazing stage outfits, and Aqours’ performances in them this year as well! Just imagining it makes me excited!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmhm, if you’re looking forward to that, I guess I’ll just have to work even harder! And from now on, Shizuku-chan, I’ll be looking forward to seeing your new and improved performances!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you very much! Having someone look forward to them makes me very motivated.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Then let’s motivate each other and do our best this year as well!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Of course! Let’s continue to work hard together this year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
